gen:link.msg:message: `RemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployees` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployeeBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_RemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployees')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployeeBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_RemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployees return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployeeBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfRemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployeesDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployeeBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfRemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployeesDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedRemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployeeBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfRemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployeesCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedRemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployeeBreakdownInvestmentFirm_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfRemunerationAdministratorInvestmentEntityEmployeesCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
